sections.subtitle: TEACHING AND RESEARCH
sections.body: The UNSW Optometry clinic is part of the School of Optometry and Vision Science, UNSW Australia. It is a teaching facility for both undergraduate and postgraduate optometry students, providing excellence in eye care and is the forefront of the latest research

sections.subtitle: USE OF CLINICAL INFORMATION IN RESEARCH STUDIES
sections.body: to the use of my de-identified* clinical information for the purpose of research
sections.footnote: * de-identified means we exclude your name and contact details from the research database

sections.subtitle: CONTACT FOR FUTURE RESEARCH STUDIES
sections.body: to be contacted with invitations to take part in teaching or clinical studies

sections.subtitle: STUDENT CLINIC CONSENT
sections.body: I acknowledge that I have been informed that the initial eye examination and subsequent care in the UNSW Optometry Clinic that I will receive, will be conducted by an optometry student under the supervision of a qualified, AHPRA registered optometrist.
to be examined by a student under supervision
